scenes.description: MC section where Kiara thanks her friends, staff, and fans.

subtitles.original: 萌え袖　ぶきゅっと握りしめたら
subtitles.english: Holding my moe-sleeves tight

subtitles.original: ミッション開始の合図
subtitles.english: The signal to start the mission

subtitles.original: カラフルな恋の味
subtitles.english: A colorful taste of love

subtitles.original: 溶けちゃう前に受け取ってプリーズ
subtitles.english: Please take it before it melts

subtitles.original: 鳴り響く鐘の音
subtitles.english: The sound of ringing bells

subtitles.original: 校舎の窓辺で二人
subtitles.english: Two people by the school building window

subtitles.original: ねえ早く言わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Hey, I have to say it soon

subtitles.original: 照れちゃうけど好きですプリーズ
subtitles.english: It's embarrassing, but I like you, please

subtitles.original: この想い君まで届け
subtitles.english: May these feelings reach you

subtitles.original: With me! Hop-step!
subtitles.english: With me! Hop-step!

subtitles.original: Uu~ Hey!
subtitles.english: Uu~ Hey!

subtitles.original: Say! Wow!
subtitles.english: Say! Wow!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Yay! That was Heart Challenger!
subtitles.english: Yay! That was Heart Challenger!

subtitles.original: Whoo! Remember a while ago
subtitles.english: Whoo! Remember a while ago

subtitles.original: at Dokomi where I had backup dancers
subtitles.english: at Dokomi where I had backup dancers

subtitles.original: who were doing the dancing for me?
subtitles.english: who were doing the dancing for me?

subtitles.original: And now I learned it myself and performed it myself!
subtitles.english: And now I learned it myself and performed it myself!

subtitles.original: Yay! That was fun, hope you enjoyed that.
subtitles.english: Yay! That was fun, hope you enjoyed that.

subtitles.original: Well, you know, if you look at the time,
subtitles.english: Well, you know, if you look at the time,

subtitles.original: you might think, oh, it's gonna be over soon.
subtitles.english: you might think, oh, it's gonna be over soon.

subtitles.original: And yeah, there is one more song,
subtitles.english: And yeah, there is one more song,

subtitles.original: but before that, let me say a few words to you guys.
subtitles.english: but before that, let me say a few words to you guys.

subtitles.original: Eisho. Yeah, we are getting close to the end,
subtitles.english: Eisho. Yeah, we are getting close to the end,

subtitles.original: and I wanted to do something like this
subtitles.english: and I wanted to do something like this

subtitles.original: for a long time, as you probably know.
subtitles.english: for a long time, as you probably know.

subtitles.original: And I wanted to show off my dance moves for so long,
subtitles.english: And I wanted to show off my dance moves for so long,

subtitles.original: which is, it's one of my, I guess, prominent skills...
subtitles.english: which is, it's one of my, I guess, prominent skills...

subtitles.original: ...and it has been my dream since the start
subtitles.english: ...and it has been my dream since the start

subtitles.original: to show it off, to get into this 3D body,
subtitles.english: to show it off, to get into this 3D body,

subtitles.original: finally be free to do whatever I want.
subtitles.english: finally be free to do whatever I want.

subtitles.original: Yeah, and the day has finally come.
subtitles.english: Yeah, and the day has finally come.

subtitles.original: I hope you guys enjoyed it so far.
subtitles.english: I hope you guys enjoyed it so far.

subtitles.original: Yeah. I want to definitely say a big thanks
subtitles.english: Yeah. I want to definitely say a big thanks

subtitles.original: to Ame and Ina and Gura for helping so much
subtitles.english: to Ame and Ina and Gura for helping so much

subtitles.original: with the recording and the setup.
subtitles.english: with the recording and the setup.

subtitles.original: You know, Ame basically built a whole studio
subtitles.english: You know, Ame basically built a whole studio

subtitles.original: for me to record this in,
subtitles.english: for me to record this in,

subtitles.original: and I really, really, really appreciate that.
subtitles.english: and I really, really, really appreciate that.

subtitles.original: Without her, it wouldn't have been possible at all.
subtitles.english: Without her, it wouldn't have been possible at all.

subtitles.original: And also big thanks to Kanauru for putting
subtitles.english: And also big thanks to Kanauru for putting

subtitles.original: together all of this into a proper concert
subtitles.english: together all of this into a proper concert

subtitles.original: and even creating this beautiful stage here.
subtitles.english: and even creating this beautiful stage here.

subtitles.original: Wow! Look, isn't it nice?
subtitles.english: Wow! Look, isn't it nice?

subtitles.original: Yeah, thank you so much.
subtitles.english: Yeah, thank you so much.

subtitles.original: In the future, I really hope that
subtitles.english: In the future, I really hope that

subtitles.original: I can do more like this more often
subtitles.english: I can do more like this more often

subtitles.original: and get more members to join me in 3D
subtitles.english: and get more members to join me in 3D

subtitles.original: if possible, to dance together.
subtitles.english: if possible, to dance together.

subtitles.original: Yeah, especially you know, Myth and Holotori
subtitles.english: Yeah, especially you know, Myth and Holotori

subtitles.original: and EN's... with all of them I want to dance
subtitles.english: and EN's... with all of them I want to dance

subtitles.original: and yeah, have fun together.
subtitles.english: and yeah, have fun together.

subtitles.original: And I think we're getting there slowly but surely.
subtitles.english: And I think we're getting there slowly but surely.

subtitles.original: By the way, if you missed it,
subtitles.english: By the way, if you missed it,

subtitles.original: the birthday merchandise was announced
subtitles.english: the birthday merchandise was announced

subtitles.original: in the previous stream before this one,
subtitles.english: in the previous stream before this one,

subtitles.original: the countdown stream.
subtitles.english: the countdown stream.

subtitles.original: And it's linked in the description,
subtitles.english: And it's linked in the description,

subtitles.original: so please go check it out if you're interested.
subtitles.english: so please go check it out if you're interested.

subtitles.original: And yeah, last but not least,
subtitles.english: And yeah, last but not least,

subtitles.original: I want to thank KFP!
subtitles.english: I want to thank KFP!

subtitles.original: You know how much I appreciate your support
subtitles.english: You know how much I appreciate your support

subtitles.original: and you believing in me and trusting in me
subtitles.english: and you believing in me and trusting in me

subtitles.original: means the world to me.
subtitles.english: means the world to me.

subtitles.original: So thank you for giving me the strength
subtitles.english: So thank you for giving me the strength

subtitles.original: in a very, very, very stressful period
subtitles.english: in a very, very, very stressful period

subtitles.original: leading up to this day.
subtitles.english: leading up to this day.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I think it was worth it.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I think it was worth it.

subtitles.original: So thank you for waiting for me
subtitles.english: So thank you for waiting for me

subtitles.original: and I will continue working hard
subtitles.english: and I will continue working hard

subtitles.original: to give back to you as much as I can.
subtitles.english: to give back to you as much as I can.

subtitles.original: Please continue supporting me and watch me grow
subtitles.english: Please continue supporting me and watch me grow

subtitles.original: into a bigger, bigger, bigger, bigger Phoenix!
subtitles.english: into a bigger, bigger, bigger, bigger Phoenix!

subtitles.original: Yeah. Now, there is one more person I want to thank,
subtitles.english: Yeah. Now, there is one more person I want to thank,

subtitles.original: but I will do that with a song.
subtitles.english: but I will do that with a song.

subtitles.original: So please listen to the last song.
subtitles.english: So please listen to the last song.

subtitles.original: Douzo.
subtitles.english: Douzo.

subtitles.original: Black★Rock Shooter / supercell
subtitles.english: Black★Rock Shooter / supercell

subtitles.original: ブラック★ロックシューター　何処へ行ったの？
subtitles.english: Black★Rock Shooter, where did you go?

subtitles.original: 聞こえますか？
subtitles.english: Can you hear me?

subtitles.original: OK! Papa!
subtitles.english: OK! Papa!

subtitles.original: 見てるかー！？
subtitles.english: Are you watching!?

subtitles.original: あとどれだけ叫べばいいんだろう
subtitles.english: How much more should I shout?

subtitles.original: あとどれだけ泣けばいいんだろう
subtitles.english: How much more should I cry?

subtitles.original: もうやめて　わたしはもう走れない
subtitles.english: Please stop, I can't run anymore
